\documentclass[
  $if(papersize)$
  $papersize$paper,
  $endif$
  $if(extraoptions)$
  $extraoptions$
  $endif$
]{$documentclass$}

$if(fontpath)$
\def\fontpath{$fontpath$}
$endif$

$if(lang)$
\def\$lang${true}
$endif$

\input{templates/preamble.tex}

$if(figcaption)$
\captionsetup{justification=$figcaption$, singlelinecheck=false}
$endif$

$if(highlighting-macros)$
$highlighting-macros$
$endif$
\providecommand{\tightlist}{\setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

\begin{document}

\newcounter{groupdef}
\pagestyle{empty}

\newpage
\tableofcontents
\newpage

$if(watermark)$
\newwatermark*[oddpages,color=red!5,angle=60,scale=12,xpos=-46,ypos=36]{\usebox\mybox}
\newwatermark*[evenpages,color=red!5,angle=60,scale=12,xpos=-59,ypos=36]{\usebox\mybox}
$endif$

\setlength{\headheight}{15pt} % fancyhead should be at least 14.03358pt
\pagestyle{fancy}

$body$

\end{document}
